static gaia::content::ClipData* gaia::content::ClipData::newRawUri ( const gaia::base::CharSequence &  label,
const gaia::net::Uri &  uri 
) [static]

Create a new ClipData holding an URI with MIME type uri Unlike newUri(ContentResolver, CharSequence, Uri), nothing is inferred about the URI -- if it is a content: URI holding a bitmap, the reported type will still be uri-list.

Use this with care!

Parameters:
labelUser-visible label for the clip data.
uriThe URI in the clip.
Returns:
Returns a new ClipData containing the specified data.
static gaia::content::ClipData* gaia::content::ClipData::newUri ( const gaia::core::ContentResolver &  resolver,
const gaia::base::CharSequence &  label,
const gaia::net::Uri &  uri 
) [static]

Create a new ClipData holding a URI.

If the URI is a content: URI, this will query the content provider for the MIME type of its data and use that as the MIME type. Otherwise, it will use the MIME type uri

Parameters:
resolverContentResolver used to get information about the URI.
labelUser-visible label for the clip data.
uriThe URI in the clip.
Returns:
Returns a new ClipData containing the specified data.
